title: Argent Bank
description: I had to create the interface for a banking application with React. I also had to implement an authentication system with an API and implement Redux to manage application state.

title: 724 Events
description: I fixed errors on an event agency's website using tests. I designed a recipe book in order to have a list of test scenarios to carry out in order to confirm that all the expected functionalities are operational.

title: Kasa
description: I created a real estate rental web application with React. I used React Router to manage the routes of the different pages. I also took into account the handling of route errors which redirect to the 404 error page.

title: Portfolio d'architecte
description: I created an interior designer portfolio. I used the APIs to create an authentication system, add projects and delete projects. The user can add projects without reloading the page, because the DOM is refreshed.

title: Print It
description: I created a dynamic and fluid carousel with javascript. I used event listeners, bullet points that let the user know which slide they are on. The carousel also includes “infinite scrolling” managed with conditions.
